title: Mincemeat and orange feathered tarts
description: These quick Christmassy bites are perfect for the festive season – grating marzipan on top gives a wonderful flavour.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a 12-hole muffin tin and 8cm/3in fluted pastry cutter.
ingredients: 25g/1oz icing sugar, plus extra for dusting
100g/3½oz ready-to-eat dried apricots, finely chopped (do this in a food processor if you're short on time)
